text: Glenn Berry (November 4, 1904 - October 31, 1995) was an American gymnast. He competed in seven events at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:1995 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Kansas
title: Glenn Berry
